title: Camille can dash through veigar stun.

replies.body:
it isn't a dash, its a pull. 

checkmate

> [{quoted}](name=ScissorsNstuff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThhUuuRz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-24T08:10:08.585+0000)
>
> it isn't a dash, its a pull. 
> 
> checkmate

the 2nd part of her pull, the kick actually goes through veigar stun. Shouldn't do that.
pulls are coded as dashes in league. shouldn't work either. thats why poppy W stops thresh lantern

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThhUuuRz,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-24T09:07:51.191+0000)
>
> pulls are coded as dashes in league. shouldn't work either. thats why poppy W stops thresh lantern

I'd but more upset if it was a one time thing but it's happened over the course of 3 different games. So it's  starting to just be annoying.
The fact that people can't tell this is a joke is a tad concerning.
This is the Gamplay board, jokes don't exist without a silly face or "/s" ;P
she does get stunned though so she gets stunned where she lands instead

Event Horizon is supposed to stop all dashes and stun. 

It does not stop Camille's E for some reason.

> It does not stop Camille's E for some reason.

she just HOPS OVER IT with her long legs {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
doesn't stop j4's flag and drag for the same reason though

It actually does stun him, J4's flag-drag can only be broken by a displacement. Otherwise he travels to the target location but still receives whatever CC. In this case, he should travel through event horizon and then be stunned at his destination.

Not sure how intended this is, but that's how j4 seems to work.
then that needs to be fixed
No, J4 flag and drag specifies that it can't be stopped, just like Malphite ult.  He still gets stunned though.
His flag and drag absolutely can be stopped, you're thinking of his ult.

"Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+120% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by 10/14/18/22/26% for 3 seconds.If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized."

> This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

J4 can use flag and drag through any form of CC, as stuns, charms, fears, etc. all count as immobilization. 

While his ult does make him immune to CC for the activation so does his Flag and Drag.

Are you sure that's how it works? I recall blocking his E-Q combo with Janna Q.
I'm pretty sure it means he can cast E-Q while snared/stunned/whatever, not that he can't be interrupted.

They mean that if he is stunned without being displaced (like by Janna's Q or something like Thresh Flay), he will get STUNNED but follow to the full dash length. So if he touches Veigar's wall, he will get stunned but keep moving.

I know I have done it through a number of different incoming cc's.  Possible I have never done it through anything other than a stun/bind/fear.  Displacements might work, can't remember ever having tried to go through a Janna tornado before so I might be wrong in that.  I was pretty sure he still goes all the way but ends with all cc still in effect on him.  Second guessing myself now though lol.

In either way it _is_ supposed to go through a Veigar stun, as stuns count as immobilization.

https://youtu.be/I_rrHSEteqg?t=14
this took me less than a second to find

Ah ok, I was mistaken on the unstoppable front.  As I mentioned to 5000000000000000 above I wasn't sure about displacements interrupting it.  Other forms of CC do not stop it though, hence why it is not a bug for it to go through Veigar stun.

Not supposed to work like that. Hecarim E stops on the gate. Same with his ult I believe. Fizz E stops. So does {{champion:84}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:154}}
hec's ult doesn't stop you can go right through it since I think it's coded as a blink,
It's because his ult can't be stopped by CC, so he'll punch straight through it.  His e, on the other hand, can be stopped by CC.
thank you for clarifying, i didn't know his ult was unstoppable, since it doesn't say it on the tool tip
It works like Vi ult. They're "stunned" but the animation is still going. But you can't do anything during the animation anyway.

It's not coded as a blink, similar to malphite and VI, they get a special "cannot be disabled" status during their ults. Camille actually gets the same effect while ulting. She can't be interrupted during the cast of her ult
She has also gone straight through poppy ult
A lot of champions can go through poppy ult though if they are "pulling" to something after the ult goes off. Thresh does the exact same thing and can pull himself back if he is frame perfect.
that's not pulling through the ult, if he's attached to someone, he can pull himself back, or the person will be partly pulled with him. I've never seen him go straight through the ult

Veiger needs a way to contain hyper-mobile champions, so we're making his stun block mobility skills.

Camile needs her mobility to function, so we're making her Q CC immune/stalled.

Lee sin Hasn't been seen in any LCS games the last 2 weeks, so we're continuing the theme and making his Q2 a blink.

Riot loves their Power creep. ;p

(This is a joke)

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThhUuuRz,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-24T16:51:47.407+0000)
>
> Veiger needs a way to contain hyper-mobile champions, so we're making his stun block mobility skills.
> 
> Camile needs her mobility to function, so we're making her Q CC immune/stalled.
> 
> Lee sin Hasn't been seen in any LCS games the last 2 weeks, so we're continuing the theme and making his Q2 a blink.
> 
> Riot loves their Power creep. ;p
> 
> (This is a joke)

And the joke is on us players....
If {{champion:111}} can be stunned during his pull animation to a wall by Veiger's E, then there's no reason Camille shouldn't either.

I think the reason this happens is because she is taken out of combat (like troll poll) meaning she cant be stopped by CC.

Incredibly stupid. Noticed this a while ago when I was playing the poro king.
If she is taken out of combat then that is a bug. She is not supposed to be completely un targetable for her gap closers, thats ridiculous
Her dash and also ult do not blow up teemo shrooms. By ult i mean like the gap close animation. She is not supposed to be un targetable for that
Actually Camille's ult specifies that she us untargetable at the start of it.  E should be fixed though.

Um... no she can't? If you CC her during her dash, she stops.

Unless you mean her ult, in which case she goes untargetable during the jump.
Think he means she still gets stunned, but she goes through the wall. Veigar got changed in may to where nobody can dash through the wall anymore; it stops dashes.

Lucian still can. About a month ago I had to deal with playing against one who realized that he could dash through an already set down cage and kept abusing the fact that I had either wasted my stun for him to escape and back off or kept it only to have him burst me with crit or trade. Either way it always ended in my death because there was no stun to safely throw out my burst.

Are you sure? Because I've done the Veigar Lucian matchup many times. In fact Veigar and Poppy are my Lucian counters, depending on if we need a tank or AP damage. From what I've seen he can't go through the wall outside of flash

Can you link a video of it happening?
Also, this belongs in Report A Bug probably?

Less of a bug, more of an oversight most likely. 

Kinda like how Ahri's E used to stop dashes.
I think that was more of a feature than a bug...
No, it was not intended. Rioter's confirmed that.
As much of a feature as animation canceling.
TIL Event Horizon blocks dashes

There are multiple champs who can move through Veigars stun and get the stun at the end of their movement animation. It's not a bug.. more so conflicting actions. Hecarim, Shyvana, Malphie, Camille, Amumu, and Vi can all move through the stun and get stunned only afterwards.
Hecarim, Shyvana, Malphite, and Vi's ultimates are all "Unstoppable" and bypass Veigar E. Amumu sounds like a bug too.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThhUuuRz,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-12-24T19:39:00.057+0000)
>
> Hecarim, Shyvana, Malphite, and Vi's ultimates are all "Unstoppable" and bypass Veigar E. Amumu sounds like a bug too.

Not talking about their ults specifically, but yes. As I stated, "..not a bug.."
Hecarims Dash (E) doesn't stop when he hits the wall but will stop and be stunned at the end of the dash.
Amumus Q can bring him through the wall right to you before applying the stun.
